SmartFieldSpec.Name: Rate Increase 2014 All Child Sponsorships Paid Ahead
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Rate Increase 2014 - Used to determine those in Paid Ahead Sponsors Segment.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Rate Increase 2014 - All Child Sponsorships Paid Ahead smart field
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_RI2014ALLCHILDSPONSORSHIPSPAIDAHEADFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date
select distinct ft.CONSTITUENTID, 1 from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.id = rsch.id join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID where rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE > '2014-04-01T23:59:59.997' and s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT between 34 and 38.99 and not exists (select 1 from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch2 join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft2 on ft2.id = rsch2.id join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit2 on ft2.ID = rsplit2.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s2 on s2.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit2.ID where rsch2.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE <= '2014-04-01' and s2.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and ft2.CONSTITUENTID = ft.CONSTITUENTID)
